sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_G206Y (DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM, FORM_CD, RESID, NAME, DAT_CD, USE_PLACE_CD, CASH_CARD_SUM, PDF_DAT_APP_YN, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR) VALUES (#dpobCd#, #yrtxBlggYr#, #clutSeptCd#, #systemkey#, (SELECT COUNT(*)+1 FROM PDF_G206Y), #formCd#, #resid#, #name#, #datCd#, #usePlaceCd#, #cashCardSum#, #pdfDatAppYn#, #pdfDatAppCmplDt#, #pdfDatAppExcCtnt#, #kybdr#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #inptAddr#, #ismt#, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'), #revnAddr#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_G206Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cashCardSeilNum# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , USE_PLACE_CD=#usePlaceCd# , CASH_CARD_SUM=#cashCardSum# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = #pdfDatAppCmplDt# , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cashCardSeilNum#

UPDATE PDF_G206Y SET PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'),0,8) , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM=#cashCardSeilNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_G206Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM, FORM_CD, RESID, NAME, DAT_CD, USE_PLACE_CD, CASH_CARD_SUM, PDF_DAT_APP_YN, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G206Y

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD, YRTX_BLGG_YR, CLUT_SEPT_CD, SYSTEMKEY, CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM, FORM_CD, RESID, NAME, DAT_CD, USE_PLACE_CD, CASH_CARD_SUM, PDF_DAT_APP_YN, PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT, PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT, KYBDR, INPT_DT, INPT_ADDR, ISMT, REVN_DT, REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_G206Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , CASH_CARD_SEIL_NUM ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_G206Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
